node.title: Australian government 'in denial' over its handling of French submarine row, ambassador says
node.alt: Ambassador Penot is sitting in a chair in a reception room at his residence. He's wearing a suit and tie.
node.description: France has restored "a degree of trust" with the United States but not with Australia after a debacle over Canberra's cancellation of a multi-billion dollar submarine deal with Paris.
node.content:
["France has restored \"a degree of trust\" with ally the United States but not with Australia after a debacle over Canberra's cancellation of a multi-billion dollar submarine deal with Paris, a French regional envoy says.", "Christophe Penot, France's ambassador for the Indo-Pacific, said the rift with Canberra continued\u00a0because the Australian government was still \"in denial\" about the way the decision was communicated.", "France accused its allies of stabbing it in the back when Australia opted for nuclear-powered submarines to be built with US\u00a0and British technology instead of a multi-billion-dollar French submarine program.", "
Difficult road to restoring trust
", "The new AUKUS security alliance is designed to give Australia access to nuclear-powered submarines for the first time, but caused a major diplomatic rift after France said it was not informed in advance.", "", "
Emmanuel Macron says Scott Morrison lied to him about Australia's intentions over submarines.(Reuters:\u00a0Guillaume Horcajuelo)
", "Paris briefly recalled\u00a0its ambassadors from Australia and the United States in protest.", "French President Emmanuel Macron later said Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison had deceived him about Canberra's intentions, a charge denied by the federal\u00a0government.", "A flurry of diplomatic contact with Washington resulted in an acknowledgement by US\u00a0President Joe Biden that the deal's announcement \"was not handled in a graceful way\".", "Mr Biden met with Mr Macron in October ahead of the Group of 20 summit.", "\"We think that we have restored a degree of trust, mutual trust with our American ally,\" Mr Penot said in Bangkok.", "But he said no such trust had been regained with Australia.", "\"So it is difficult to make progress and restore trust if they are in denial.\"", "Mr Morrison has argued that he had previously explained to Mr Macron that conventional submarines would no longer meet Australia's needs, ahead of the AUKUS deal.", "Reuters"]
